column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔgyee Jerusalɛm (wɔ Judahen Zedekia afe a otsia akron no mu
column4: Babilɔnhen Nebukadenezar na no dɔm nyinara wɔbaa Jerusalɛm
na bosoom no mu da a otsia akron no mu

column2: "ma Babilɔnhen n’asafohen no nyinara bɛhɛɛn kurow no mu
column3: na wɔtsenatsenaa finimfin abow kɛse no mu
column10: wɔnye Babilɔnhen n’asafohen nkaa no nyinara."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ aber a Judahen Zedekia
column3: na mbarimba akofo no nyinara hun hɔn no
column5: na wofii kurow no mu fiir anadwe
column6: duaa ɔhen no ture mu kwan do
column7: dze faa abow kɛse mu wɔ afasu ebien ntamu: na wɔdze faa Araba kwan do kɔree."

column2: "Na Kaldeafo hɔn dɔm no tsiiw hɔn
column3: na wɔkɔtoo Zedekia wɔ Jeriko tɛtɛr mu: na wɔkyeer no no
column4: wɔdze no baa Babilɔnhen Nebukadenezar nkyɛn wɔ Ribla wɔ Hamat asaase do

column2: "Nna Babilɔnhen kunkum Zedekia ne mba wɔ Ribla wɔ n’enyim: eso Babilɔnhen kunkum Juda ekunyin no nyinara."

column3: na ɔtoo no mpokyerɛ dɛ wɔmfa no nkɔ Babilɔn."

column2: "Na Kaldeafo dze gya hyeew ahemfi no
column4: na wodwuruuw Jerusalɛm afasu no guu famu."

column2: "Nna aweɔmfo safohen Nebuzaradan faa ɔman no nkaa a wɔkaa kurow no mu no; na hɔn a wɔdanee kɔr ne nkyɛn no so
column3: na ɔman no nkaa a wɔkae no nyinara ndɔmmum kɔr Babilɔn."

column2: "Na aweɔmfo safohen Nebuzaradan gyaa ɔman no mu ehiafo a wonnyi hwee no wɔ Juda asaase do
column3: na ɔdze wenyin nture na mfuwa memaa hɔn da no ara."

column2: "Afei Babilɔnhen Nebukadenezar hyɛɛ aweɔmfo safohen Nebuzaradan wɔ Jeremia ho dɛ
column6: na mma nnyɛ no bɔn biara; na dza ɔbɛse wo nyina yɛ ma no."

column7: na Babilɔnhen n’asafohen etsitsir no nyinara wɔsomae;"

column2: "wɔsomae ma wɔkɛfaa Jeremia fii aweɔmfo abangua no mu bae
column3: na wɔdze no hyɛɛ Safan ba Ahikam ne ba Gedalia nsa
column4: dɛ ɔmfa no nkɔ fie: nna ɔkɛtsenaa no nkorɔfo no mu."

column2: "Afei Jeremia da ho da efiadze wɔ aweɔmfo abangua no no mu no
column3: nna EWURADZE n’asɛm baa no hɔ dɛ
column11: mebɛma me nsɛm aba mu wɔ kurow yi do ayɛ mbusu
column12: na nnyɛ papa bi a; na ɔbɛba mu wɔ w’enyim da no."

column3: EWURADZE na ɔse: na wɔremmfa wo nnhyɛ mbarimba a isuro hɔn no nsa."

column4: na wo nkwa bɛyɛ afonam ama wo: osiandɛ ɔwo edze wo werɛ atwer me
